The Gangrel violently tears something, or someone, apart.

Attack

(Target) +2 SLOW token.
characters.arenKonway.passive1.name: Pack leader
characters.haroldBeaulieu.name: Harold Beaulieu
characters.haroldBeaulieu.special1.name: Confusion
characters.haroldBeaulieu.special1.descr:
Target: Highest Attack

Harold messes up his enemy's mind, leaving them confused.

Attack

(Target) -1 ATTACK level until the end of their next turn.
characters.haroldBeaulieu.special2.name: Mind crush
characters.haroldBeaulieu.special2.descr:
Target: Highest Initiative

Under the Malkavian's powers, no mind remains intact.

Attack

(Target) -2 Initiative.
characters.haroldBeaulieu.passive1.name: Investigator
characters.luciannaRicci.name: Lucianna Ricci
characters.luciannaRicci.special1.name: Quell the beast
characters.luciannaRicci.special1.descri:
Target: Highest Hunger

Appease the inner Beast of an ally and reduce their thirst for blood.

Special

(Player) -1 Hunger.
characters.luciannaRicci.special2.name: Punch
characters.luciannaRicci.special2.descri:
Target: Least Injured

Lucianna punches as enemy with all her strength.

Attack

(Target) +1 Damage, Push back 1 HEX
characters.luciannaRicci.passive1.name: Spy knowledge
characters.nicoMiller.name: Nico Miller
characters.nicoMiller.special1.name: Swift
characters.nicoMiller.special1.descripti:
Target: Highest Initiative

Nico calls upon the Blood to quicken her pace.

Attack

(Self) +3 Movement, +1 Initiative.
characters.nicoMiller.special2.name: Entrancement
characters.nicoMiller.special2.descripti:
Target: Highest Attack

Look into my eyes.

Attack

(Target) Pull 2 HEX towards Nico.
characters.nicoMiller.passive1.name: Empathy
characters.jadeLinhDuplessis.name: Jade Linh-Duplessis
characters.jadeLinhDuplessis.special1.de:
Target: Lowest Initiative

Jade uses her powers to uncover her enemies' secrets.

Special

(Target) reveal their combat card.
characters.jadeLinhDuplessis.special2.de:
Target: Most Injured

Hand outstretched, the Tremere empties a target of their blood.

Attack

(Target) +1 Damage, +1 SLOW token
